full_name: Scenario II: Return to At Death's Doorstep

steps.text: Set the eight [[Spectral]] locations aside, out of play.

Put each of the eight non-[[Spectral]] locations into play (Entry Hall, Victorian Halls, Trophy Room, Billiards Room, Master Bedroom, Balcony, Office, and Wine Cellar). Each investigator begins play in the Entry Hall.
Put the Senator Nathaniel Rhodes enemy into play in the Entry Hall, with 1 [per_investigator] clues on him.
When act 1b instructs the players to shuffle the Realm of Death encounter set into the encounter deck, shuffle in the Unstable Realm encounter set instead.

For the duration of this scenario, the following additional rule applies:
"While resolving The Watcher's Grasp treachery, The Spectral Watcher does not exhaust after it attacks."
Attach the Return to At Death's Doorstep card to the scenario reference card as a reminder.
